DOC.brief_summary: This blinded cross-over study aim to evaluate the efficacy of topical liposome-encapsulated ropivacaine formulations.
DOC.brief_title: Topical Formulations of Liposomal Local Anesthetics
DOC.detailed_description: This blinded cross-over study aim to evaluate the efficacy of topical liposome-encapsulated 1 and 2% ropivacaine gel formulations.
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers were free from cardiac, hepatic, renal, pulmonary, neurological, gastrointestinal and haematological diseases, psychiatric disorders and allergy to local anesthetics
